2.3.1.7. lex_RestorePosition()

[<<<] [>>>]

Use this function to restore the lexeme position that was saved calling the function lex_SavePosition() 

void lex_RestorePosition(pLexObject pLex,
                         pLexeme *ppPosition
  )@{
[<<<] [>>>]
